name: Helix Jump (itch) (Alzawbari Moes)
description:
Helix Jump is a fun-addicting 3D game. Helix Jump is a lively jumping challenge game in which you have to help a ball fall to the bottom of a spiral maze. Jump Helix grabs the classic ball as the theme, jump forward in the rising spiral ladder.

Disclaimer : It is a copy of the well-known game "Helix Jump" developed by Voodoo co. Therefore I do not own the idea, however, as I found it challenging to develop the game, I tried to make a similar game, and the seen objects and the code were designed by me.
